item.title: Baked Sausage With Sweet Potato And Fennel
item.description: Ingredients 500g sweet potatoes (approx. 2 large ones), peeled 1 healthy-sized fennel bulb 3 garlic cloves, peeled and sliced 1 tsp celery seeds 1 tbsp dark brown sugar 3 tbsp olive oil 8 solid, good-quality sausages 8 smoked back bacon rashers 1 tbsp plain flour 100ml apple juice 50ml dry white wine (rough measurement) 2 tbsp balsamic vinegar 1 or 2 sprigs of thyme or fennel fronds if you can find them Salt and pepper Method Preheat the oven to 200C.
